actions.name: Iron Barbs

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack.

Effect: The source of the triggering attack takes 2 Ticks of HP damage, and loses -1 ATK Stage for 5 Activations.
